title: "More than 3 in 4 Americans Feel Less Safe in Self-Driving Cars, Survey Finds"
excerpt: "The survey found a majority of Americans (76%) say they would feel less safe driving or riding in cars with self-driving features. Similarly, 73% of people would feel less safe knowing others on the road are traveling in cars with self-driving features."
